name: Fatui Electro Cicin Mage
storytitle: Thunder in the Mist: Electro Cicin Mage
storytext: ...Just as the scent of Mist Grass intoxicates the Electro Cicins, so too does the sadistic mage hanker after the pleasure of toying with her foe...
source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with Electro Cicin Mage

skills.name: Thundering Shield
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], applies $[K204] to this character, creates 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C124042]</color> and prepares <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S24044]</color>.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>, applies <color=#FFACFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}Electro Application</color> to this character, creates 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro Cicin Ward</color> and prepares <color=#FFFFFFFF>Surging Thunder</color>.
skills.description: Deals 1 Electro DMG, applies Electro Application to this character, creates 1 Electro Cicin Ward and prepares Surging Thunder.
